BasicInfo.short: Brekeke Software, Inc., is an industry-leading developer of SIP (Session Initiation Protocol) software products for IP (Internet Protocol)

Products.name: Brekeke Contact Center Suite (CCS)
Products.description: Brekeke Contact Center Suite (CCS) is a software suite that includes everything you need to build a smart and reliable contact center.

Products.name: Brekeke JTAPI SDK
Products.description: The Brekeke JTAPI SDK, is a software development kit for creating SIP-enabled telephony applications.

Products.name: Brekeke SIP Server
Products.description: Brekeke SIP Server is a SIP-based communication platform for service providers and enterprises.
